title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Lindsey seeks comfort from Joe after split from Freddie - Hollyoaks Soaps
text: Hollyoaks' Lindsey Butterfield needs a shoulder to cry on tonight (October 14) and her ex-fiancé Joe Roscoe is happy to oblige.Lindsey (Sophie Austin) seeks support as her marriage to Joe's brother Freddie remains on the rocks following Kim's vengeful scheming. © Lime PicturesLindsey confides in Joe Last night's E4 first look episode saw Lindsey left devastated when she overheard a drunken Freddie describing her as the biggest mistake he's ever made.Freddie made the harsh remark as he was bitter that Lindsey had been fooled by Kim's false claims of an affair between them.Tonight's E4 airing sees Freddie try his best to make amends with Lindsey, but she snubs him and insists that their marriage is broken beyond repair.Lindsey needs someone to talk to and shares all of her troubles with Joe (Ayden Callaghan) but Mercedes McQueen is jealous when she spots them looking so close. © Lime PicturesMercedes spots Joe and Lindsey looking close © Lime PicturesJoe defends himself to Mercedes © Lime PicturesLindsey also tries to explain © Lime PicturesMercedes has some harsh words for Lindsey As Mercedes (Jennifer Metcalfe) accuses her friend of flip-flopping between the Roscoe brothers, is she right to suspect that there's still a chemistry between Lindsey and Joe?Hollyoaks airs these scenes tonight (October 14) at 7pm on E4 and tomorrow (October 15) at 6.30pm on Channel 4.Read our full spoiler for this episode of HollyoaksRead more Hollyoaks spoilers and newsDigital Spy Soap Scoop video - hit play below for gossip on more Gloved Hand Killer deaths in Hollyoaks, the reveal of Robert Sugden's shooter in Emmerdale, a drastic decision from Kathy Beale in EastEnders and Alya Nazir's guilt spiralling out of control in Coronation Street. function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID);
